title: Management Innovation Through Artistic Thinking: Creative Leadership Development

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental knowledge of business administration and general understanding of artistic activities
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment combining face-to-face workshops with online collaboration platforms. Art creation and project development using digital devices (tablets/smartphones)

learning_goals: Demonstrate three or more empirical creative problem-solving competencies through artistic experiences (visual arts, music, theater)
Propose collaborative leadership and organizational innovation strategies through team-based art projects
Document artistic learning processes in digital portfolios while composing reflective self-assessment reports
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
